``` ## During class To save these slides as a PDF on your computer, open the menu (three horizontal bars in the bottom left of the slides), then Tools (gear symbol in the top), and PDF export (or ``e''). You can then right-click on the slides, select Print, and save as PDF.

View all slides in new window
